Name: Hoopla
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Not far removed from a Sidecar .
History: Perhaps a riff on the Hoop La! Cocktail recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book . The same book also features two other cocktails with the exact same recipe: the Frank Sullivan Cocktail and Odd McIntyre Cocktail.
Nutrition: One serving of Hoopla contains 173 calories
